title: KIM SWITCH / SAMARAN BUTTER
description: Kim asks you what you think might have happened at the canal.

dialogueTree.title: You: ""It looks like someone was in a rea..."
dialogueTree.text: "It looks like someone was in a real hurry."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What kind of car do you think it w..."
links.text: "What kind of car do you think it was?"

links.title: You: ""I think it was a Coupris 40.""
links.text: "I think it was a Coupris 40."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He seems impressed. "That's quite l..."
links.text: He seems impressed. "That's quite likely, from what I can tell."

links.title: You: ""I believe it was a Linnea G22.""
links.text: "I believe it was a Linnea G22."

links.title: You: ""I have no idea.""
links.text: "I have no idea."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I suppose it's not really our job..."
links.text: "I suppose it's not really our job to figure that out."

links.title: You: ""I have some ideas about who it mig..."
links.text: "I have some ideas about who it might have been."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He raises his eyebrows. "Oh?""
links.text: He raises his eyebrows. "Oh?"

links.title: You: ""It had to be someone really cool a..."
links.text: "It had to be someone really cool and courageous."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I suppose that narrows it down som..."
links.text: "I suppose that narrows it down somewhat. Fortunately, we're not traffic cops. Should we get back to the murder?"

links.title: You: ""It was someone dangerous. Perhaps..."
links.text: "It was someone dangerous. Perhaps this is somehow *connected* to the murder?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The traffic hooliganism? I hope no..."
links.text: "The traffic hooliganism? I hope not. Fortunately, we're not traffic cops. Should we get back to the murder?"

links.title: You: ""Actually, never mind, I need more..."
links.text: "Actually, never mind, I need more evidence to come up with a list of suspects."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We're not traffic cops. Should we..."
links.text: "We're not traffic cops. Should we get back to the murder?"

links.title: You: ""Yeah, I have no idea. Who could it..."
links.text: "Yeah, I have no idea. Who could it have been?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant shrugs. "We're not t..."
links.text: The lieutenant shrugs. "We're not traffic cops. Should we get back to the murder?"

links.title: You: "Try to come up with a convincing ex..."
links.text: Try to come up with a convincing explanation for the driver's actions.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Somewhere in the depths of your alc..."
links.text: Somewhere in the depths of your alcohol-addled soul, you find a few threads that you can weave into a story.

links.title: You: ""This could have only been..." (Pau..."
links.text: "This could have only been..." (Pause dramatically.) "... Jacob Irw."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The TipTop Tournée champion?""
links.text: "The TipTop Tournée champion?"

links.title: You: ""After the untimely death of dear f..."
links.text: "After the untimely death of dear friend and fellow racer Alfie Deletraz at Fjordhammer, Jacob Irw was desperately chasing death on the race track -- but death *eluded* him."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant patiently listens to..."
links.text: The lieutenant patiently listens to the words coming from your mouth.

links.title: You: ""After quitting in frustration, he..."
links.text: "After quitting in frustration, he became a recluse, a ghost-driver, searching for death on the streets of Revachol, speeding..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""... jumping canals at night?" He i..."
links.text: "... jumping canals at night?" He interrupts you. "If I was Jacob Irw I wouldn't drive in *Martinaise*. The roads are awful."

links.title: Authority: "Shut *down*."
links.text: Shut *down*.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""In conclusion -- it's a colourful..."
links.text: "In conclusion -- it's a colourful theory, but I don't believe Jacob Irw did this. Should we go?"

links.title: Conceptualization: "You've thought of a very touching s..."
links.text: You've thought of a very touching story. It's shit, though.

links.title: You: "That's okay, I love shit stories."
links.text: That's okay, I love shit stories.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Well, you're in luck, then."
links.text: Well, you're in luck, then.

links.title: You: ""See, Kim, what happened here is --..."
links.text: "See, Kim, what happened here is -- the driver was a man whose wife was about to give birth..."

links.title: Conceptualization: "Yes, this is good, this is very goo..."
links.text: Yes, this is good, this is very good.

links.title: Rhetoric: "No, it's shit."
links.text: No, it's shit.

links.title: You: ""He was out drinking with his pals..."
links.text: "He was out drinking with his pals when he got the news, and, flushed with paternal pride, he got into his Coupris at once and raced to the clinic..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, yes, that could very well hav..."
links.text: "Yes, yes, that could very well have been it. Now let's move on. We're not traffic cops."

links.title: You: "Maybe I shouldn't tell it if it's s..."
links.text: Maybe I shouldn't tell it if it's shit.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Nope, you're already telling it."
links.text: Nope, you're already telling it.

links.title: Volition: "The urge is strong, but you are str..."
links.text: The urge is strong, but you are stronger.

links.title: You: ""No, we need to find this Jacob Irw..."
links.text: "No, we need to find this Jacob Irw before tragedy strikes." (Take the task.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He sighs. "If we must.""
links.text: He sighs. "If we must."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "I'm not expecting him to get far wi..."
links.text: I'm not expecting him to get far with this, the lieutenant consoles himself.

links.title: You: ""We should bring this driver to jus..."
links.text: "We should bring this driver to justice." (Take the task.)

links.title: You: ""On second thought, maybe this does..."
links.text: "On second thought, maybe this doesn't really warrant an investigation." [Leave.]

links.title: You: ""Let's move on. We've learned all w..."
links.text: "Let's move on. We've learned all we can here." [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: You: ""Some top-shelf shenanigans. I want..."
dialogueTree.text: "Some top-shelf shenanigans. I want to meet the driver and shake his hand."

dialogueTree.title: You: ""I don't care and it's not really o..."
dialogueTree.text: "I don't care and it's not really our concern." [Leave.]

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You're right." He straightens his..."
links.text: "You're right." He straightens his back. "Let's get back to the murder investigation."
